name: Syle
format:
<style>
    .md-toolbar-tools {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
</style>
<style>
    /* Styling for all the groups */
    ui-card-panel {
        box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35) 0px 5px 15px;
        border-radius: 5px;
        margin: auto;
        justify-content: center;
        text-align: center;
    }

    /* Styling for all the Elements in the Groups */
    ui-card-panel * {
        border-radius: 2.5px;
        justify-content: center;
        text-align: center;
    }

    /* Styling of the Group Title */
    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        font-weight: bold !important;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .title {
        font-family: Verdana, sans-serif !important;
        font-size: 28px !important;
        color: #e7463d !important;
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: bold !important;
    }

    /* Styling the 'Weapon Detected' and 'Details' sections */
    .section-title {
        font-family: Verdana, sans-serif !important;
        font-size: 24px !important;
        color: #333; /* You can adjust this color if needed */
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: bold !important;
    }
</style>
